zoopedia_f1help.text:
Camera Movement
-----------------------
Arrow Keys OR
W : Scroll Forward
A : Scroll Left
S : Scroll Backward
D : Scroll Right
-
Camera Rotation
--------------------
CTRL + Mouse OR
CTRL + Arrow Keys
-
Camera Zoom
-----------------
+ : Zoom In
- : Zoom Out
zoopedia_f1help.page2:
Save/Load
-----------------------
F6: Save Game
F7: Load Game
-
Terrain Mode [icon]
-----------------------
[icon] Create Hill
[icon] Create Valley
[icon] Create Cliff
[icon] Smooth Terrain
-----------------------
[ : Decrease Terrain Deformation Brush Size
] : Increase Terrain Deformation Brush Size
Left Button: Perform Selected Terrain Operation.

zoopedia_f1help2.text:
Placement Mode [animal and foliage icons]
-----------------------------------------
Left click on animal or object icon in the panel,
then left click to place the object in the world.
-
Selection Mode [icon]
-----------------------------------------
Click on an object in the world to select it. Click on the selected object to move it and place it somewhere else.
-
Deletion Mode [icon]
-----------------------------------------
Left click on object in the world to delete it.
-
UI Panels
-----------------------------------------
F1: Show/Hide Zoopedia
zoopedia_f1help2.page2:
First Person Controls
--------------------------
Right click toggles between movement mode and cursor mode.
Left click while in movement mode to move around.
-
First Person Camera Controls
--------------------------
Right click toggles between camera mode and cursor mode.
Left click while in cameramode to take a picture.

zoopedia_challenge.text: Use this button to play the game in challenge mode, with few rules.

zoopedia_freeform.text: Use this button to play the game in freeform mode, with no rules.

zoopedia_campaign.text: Use this button to play the game in campaign mode.

zoopedia_options.text: Use this button to set game options.

zoopedia_downloads.text: Use this button to download addition Zoo Tycoon 2 content.

zoopedia_loadgame.text: Use this button to load a previously-saved game.

zoopedia_exitgame.text: Use this button to exit Zoo Tycoon 2.
